title: Kentucky Lawmakers Pushing for 15-year-olds to Get Driver's Licenses
description: Kentucky lawmakers have approved a bill lowering the minimum age for a learnerâ€™s permit to 15 instead of 16. Several other US states allow for permits at 15, but some restrict approval for a 15-year-old until after a certain number of months, like Maryland, which has a minimum age of 15 and nine ...
